english_example_sentence: If I take this beautiful book, my mother will be happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если я возьму эту красивую книгу, моя мама обрадуется.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu güzel kitabı alsam, annem sevinir.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu güzel kitabı ______, annem sevinir.
